sentence.Network_en: He left his Montana ranch to his spinster sister.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把他在蒙大拿州的大牧场留给了他未婚的妹妹.

sentence.Network_en: There's nothing shameful in being a spinster.
sentence.Network_cn: 当老处女也没什么丢人的,看看皮蒂姑妈.

sentence.Network_en: It'sounds like some old spinster with a pleated skirt and frilly blouse.
sentence.Network_cn: 它听起来就像一个穿着镶褶边的衬衫和百褶裙的老处女.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...大龄单身女性（英语：spinster），是指已经过了社会通常所认为的适婚年龄，但仍然未结婚|婚的女性，广义上是指25岁及以上的单身|未婚女性，尤其是指有自主经济基础的女性，常见于发达国家及发展中国家都市化程度较高的地区。[http://www.libera.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... pollster 民意测验家 spinster 未婚女人，老处女 monster 庞然大物，怪物.
老字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 老公公〖 grandpa〗 老姑娘〖 spinster〗 老古板〖 beultraconservative;fuddy-duddy〗.
词根及词缀 ... pollster n 民意测验家 spinster n 未婚女人 hipster n 赶时髦的人.

list.abs: masculine supremacy rapidly deteriorated as spinster sisters moved into apartments and wives gained independence by going to work .由于未婚姐妹搬进公寓，妻子参加工作而获得独立，男子优势迅速衰退。
particularly not with some verbally incontinent spinster ., 尤其是那些说话不经大脑.
a fifty - year - old spinster ., 五十岁的老处女.
He left his Montana ranch to his spinster sister ., 他把他在蒙大拿州的大牧场留给了他未婚的妹妹.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'woman who spins'): from the verb spin + -ster; in early use the term was appended to names of women to denote their occupation. The current sense dates from the early 18th cent

entry.tran: (老)处女;未婚中年(或老年)女子
entry.def: A spinster is a woman who has never been married; used especially when talking about an old or middle-aged woman.

means.word_mean: 2. someone who spins (who twists fibers into threads)

auth_sentence.content: My father entirely supported his three spinster sisters.

auth_sentence.content: She lived alone in her house in Battersea and died a spinster.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: She lived alone in her house in Battersea and died a spinster.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 顽皮的人,爱开玩笑的人

rhyme押韵的词+ster……人→n.作诗者,打油诗人

spin纺纱+ster……人→纺纱的[女人]→未婚女人
